website_summaries.verdict: A very realistic-looking buck that effectively draws real deer within range.
pros: Does a good job of fooling bucks into coming to fight him
Includes anchor loops to help keep the decoy in a standing position
Withstands the wind well if staked properly
Comes with a carrying strap and bag
cons: Can be tricky to set up and is a bit noisy to set up

customer_reviews.title: Very life like
customer_reviews.text: This decoy is true size. Looks like a 120 point buck. Well built, should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nodena Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Stakes are all but useless. There are better quality decoys out there for ...
customer_reviews.text: Rather cheap construction. Legs won't stay attached. Horns move around in the wind. Stakes are all but useless. There are better quality decoys out there for what I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: William Perry

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The color is way off .cheaply made . Cheap sob don't give you any stakes to put in the ground with will not stand on its own
customer_reviews.author: William Shay

customer_reviews.title: It’s a big motha
customer_reviews.text: Decent product but this is a Montana sized deer it’s way too big for Midwest hunting. It’s the size of a horse.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This decoy is very easy to use. The look is very realistic and setup is simple. I have found that combined with calling it will bring in deer. The lightweight makes it easy to carry in and out when hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Works great during rut
customer_reviews.text: Works great during rut. Pair it up with a doe decoy for secondary rut. Dynamite. Would recommend carry strap and the tail.
customer_reviews.author: David Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was better made than I thought also arrived within 4 days of ordering!! Very happy with everything! Can't wait to use it this fall!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wallen

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well for us brought in a nice buck I’ll bristled up
customer_reviews.author: cory mitteness

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a Xmas gift but our son will love it.looks very sturdy and lifelike m
customer_reviews.author: dawn jones

customer_reviews.title: bought them because of the great reviews on them
customer_reviews.text: Ok, here's the deal on these, I paid quite a bit for these, bought them because of the great reviews on them, had them for awhile and I like to use things awhile before I rate them to give honost opinions on things, here goes!, I have tried them for two seasons now, they look excellent, but I truely believe they are too big for the south, I've tried them in many situations and find that I just have better luck not using them at all, make nice lawn ornaments tho, I have had deer come within eye distance, but as soon as real deer see them, they bolt before I can get a shot. But for looks, 3.
customer_reviews.author: Michael l. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Decoy works fine. Had a hole in the chest when it ...
customer_reviews.text: Decoy works fine. Had a hole in the chest when it was delivered. It looks like a manufacturing flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: goes together easy light
customer_reviews.text: Legs are a little wobbly, goes together easy light weight
customer_reviews.author: nmkid

customer_reviews.title: Improved
customer_reviews.text: Reading other reviews of legs falling off, they have really improved. That can no longer happen quick easy setup now
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decoy shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertised and shipping was crazy fast! Called in a mature buck the first time I used it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Fast sevice. Good quality. Can't wait to try out this deer season.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: looks good but legs aren't the best
customer_reviews.text: the back leg falls off. looks good but be careful of the rear legs. Works best if you can leave it in the field so it will be fine for private land but not worth the effort if you have to carry in and out every day.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Super light and as real as it gets!
customer_reviews.text: great item, realistic and very light to cary! It has a strap that allows you to cary it on your shoulder. All parts fit inside body. Very nice item for the hunt.
customer_reviews.author: George N Aronis

customer_reviews.title: The rear legs do not fit as good as the front legs
customer_reviews.text: The rear legs do not fit as good as the front legs. I used screws to make the legs more stable. I did the same thing to the horns because they were really loose and sloppy. The should have used the same type of attachment that was used on the ears. From 20 feet away the deer looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Don Smith

customer_reviews.title: Like the way it packs up inside itself
customer_reviews.text: Wow, very realistic and large size. Like the way it packs up inside itself.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin E Hedstrom

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected :)
customer_reviews.text: Item is great quality and great workmanship. Great value for the price because it comes with the antlers too! He's bigger then the ones I have, but variety is good.
customer_reviews.author: TBKJJK

customer_reviews.title: Realistic but not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but kind of rickety when assembled. DO NOT CARRY THIS IN THE WOODS ASSEMBLED.
customer_reviews.author: Mike the Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decoys had absolutely no effect on area deer herd. ...
customer_reviews.text: Decoys had absolutely no effect on area deer herd. Deer herd failed to pay any attention to either does or buck decoys.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Not worth more than $100 my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: The molding is not a tight fitting one leg is loose and head didn't click/lock on so with a fine saw and a screw it works fine thank you Amazon for following threw with the product since a vendor didn't send me what I ordered from them.
customer_reviews.author: jeff w

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Very realistic
customer_reviews.text: I did not use these for what most people buy them for. I wanted a realistic looking deer to use as Christmas decorations. This is exactly what I was looking for. Easy to put together and take apart for storage. I will probably buy a couple more. Boss Buck (back) and Boss Babe in the front
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Head didn’t fit on the body cavity. Was a defective product
customer_reviews.author: Rick Zaehringer

customer_reviews.title: Works once in place but is awfully noisy
customer_reviews.text: Shot my biggest buck using it this bow season but also spooked every deer in the woods carry it in days in advance. It really needs a rubber coating. Have not had any issues with bad craftsmanship just awkward and noisy other wise would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Save your receipt!
customer_reviews.text: I returned mine. Did not stand up well and head fell off with any breeze. Whole thing fell over when the wind picked up. Also does not come with a carry case which you expect at this high price. You need something to carry the decoy in. Desperate hunters spend money on desperate things. this is one of those items. Save your receipt!
customer_reviews.author: Red Sunset

product_meta.title: Flambeau Outdoors 5965MS Boss Buck - Masters Series Deer Decoy
product_meta.description: Amazing realism created by award winning sculptor Chris Schiller. Deploy the Boss Buck to entice a territorial trophy buck to come running and fight for his turf...right in your sights. The most life-like deer decoy available when it comes down to REALISM THAT GETS RESULTS, the Boss Buck sets the stage for a good ol' rut battle faster than you can say RUT.
feature_bullets: FIELD-PROVEN: Durable, 3-D blow molded HDPE plastic deer decoy with ultra-realistic detail for luring in whitetail deer

ULTRA-REALISTIC HUNTING DECOY: The Boss Buck's anatomically correct posture and true-to-life size of a large, mature buck entices whitetail bucks—from little baskets to chandelier Booners—to come running to investigate or fight, especially during the rut.
COLLAPSIBLE & PORTABLE: Features a removable leg design that allows the legs to fit conveniently in the body cavity for easy transportation or storage. Heavy-duty threaded leg posts and locking lugs.
DETAILS & FEATURES: Includes an 8-point set of plastic antlers and a blaze orange carry sling.
Decoy Dimensions - Nose to tail: 60" / Antler tip to ground: 58" / Body width at widest point: 13" / Shoulder to ground: 41"
